data.title: 2023 Emmy Nominees - NATAS Mid-Atlantic Chapter
data.meta_description: 2023 MID-ATLANTIC EMMY® AWARDS NOMINEES 101- OVERALL EXCELLENCE “WPXI Overall Excellence”- WPXI-TV     Kevin Hayes, General Manager “WNEP – Overall Excellence”- WNEP-TV     Julie Eisenman, President & General Manager “WTAE-TV”- WTAE     Charles W. Wolfertz III, President & General Manager “WQED Multimedia”- WQED Multimedia … Continue reading →
